1370: Remdo was born in De Tuyt in 1370.
Got married to Berta at age 30 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Berta, Berta, at age 30.
Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 1 years old.
1371: Had a son with Berta, Robbrecht, at age 31.
1372: Had a son with Berta, Walramus, at age 32.
1373: Lost son Robbrecht when Robbrecht was 3 years old.
1374: Lost daughter Uergina when Uergina was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Berta gave birth to their stillborn daughter Uergina in 1374.
1375: Lost son Walramus when Walramus was 4 years old.
1376: Lost his wife Berta while she was giving birth to Heideric in 1376.
